scripts.local:setup: wait-on http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph create Palm-Network/eip721-subgraph --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.local:redeploy: graph codegen && wait-on http://127.0.0.1:5001/api/v0/version http-get://127.0.0.1:8000 && graph deploy Palm-Network/eip721-subgraph --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.mainnet:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.palm.io --node https://graph-api.palm.io --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN Palm-Network/eip721-subgraph
scripts.testnet:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.palm-uat.xyz --node https://graph-api.palm-uat.xyz --debug --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN Palm-Network/eip721-subgraph-testnet
scripts.devnet:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --ipfs https://graph-ipfs.palm-dev.xyz --node https://graph-api.palm-dev.xyz --debug --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN Palm-Network/eip721-subgraph-devnet
